```{r}

library(tidyverse)

sets <- read_csv('sets.csv')
themes <- read_csv('themes.csv')
parts <- read_csv('parts.csv')
part_categories <- read_csv('part_categories.csv')

```

```{r}
counties <- read_csv('counties.csv')
counties

counties %>%
	select(state, county, population, professional:production)
	
countries %>%
	select(state, county, population, ends_with("work"), starts_with("income")
	

```
The rename verb

```{r}
counties %>%
	count(state) %>%
	rename(num_counties = n)

counties %>%
	select(state, county, poverty_rate = poverty)
	
```


using transmute

```{r}
counties %>%
	transmute(state, county, population, density=population/land_area) %>%
	filter (population > 1000000) %>%
	arrange(density)
	
	
```


```{r}
counties %>%
	rename(unemproyment_rate = unemployment)

counties %>%
	select(state, county, contains("poverty"))
	

```

diferencia entre mutate y transmute

```{r}
contains %>%
	mutate(fraction_women = women/population)

counties %>%
	transmute(state)
	
	
```

themes
